name: Flight of the Bumblebee - Sacrilegious Edition
name_original: Flight of the Bumblebee - Sacrilegious Edition
description:
A game dedicated to TwoSetViolin! In this game, you play as Brett, and you have to destroy the sacrilegious beehive to restore peace to the classical community! However... while attempting to do this you will face opposition from the bees. Dodge their attacks and defeat the beehive to win, lest you are to deplete your health and lose! While playing, you'll soon notice that many of the things in the game are TwoSet references, memes. As such, it would be best for TwoSetters to play this game. If you haven't watched TwoSetViolin yet, go do so on Youtube!

To quickly get adjusted to the game, navigate to Practice -> How To Play, which will show you a "tutorial". Make sure to upgrade your skills whenever you can!

Patch Version 1.1:

- Fixed sound when the boss dies

- Beehives no longer fall when you use the special attack on level 8

- Fixed a bug where the player's normal attack cooldowns reset upon the beehive's death

- A beehive that's falling right when you enable your special attack on level 10 will now freeze mid-air instead of dropping

- Vibrato's radius now shows as a red "radar signal"

- Charge gain/loss is now displayed as text!

- Minor bug fixes

For any bug fixes, please comment about it!
